column5: Does anyone know the name and contact info for the boat/atv dealer on 64 around Alban. Right now it escapes me and I have had no luck searching for it. He seems to carry boats,atvs,and snowmobiles. He is on the left side of 64 when travelling towards 69. thanks
You thinking of The Sports Centre on hwy 64, Noelville?

off the top of my head the French River supply post & marina comes to mind but I don't think it's what you are thinking of.  maybe this page will help jar your memory?  http://frenchriveren.iwebez.com/siteengine/ActivePage.asp?PageID=162
thanks guys yes it is the sports centre in Noelville. thanks again.
(705) 898-2936.   Had to get a fuel filter replaced at The Sports Center last year.   (Probably a little late in my reply).
